summary: Replaces Daedric weapons with nicer weapon models.
descriptionHtml:
-update version 1.1-

Replaced the model for Daedric Battleaxe with The Rueful Axe, replaced the model for the Daedric Mace with the Mace of Molag Bal, and replaced the model for the Daedric Warhammer with Volendrung.

-version 1.0-

This mod replaces the models for the Daedric Battleaxe, War Axe, Bow, Dagger, Greatsword and Sword with the models for the Draugr Battleaxe, Draugr Handaxe, Nightingale Bow, Blade of Woe, Draugr Greatsword and Draugr Sword respectively.

My reason for making this mod was simply that I dont like the way the Daedric weapons look compared to the models I chose to replace them with, which ordinarily I would be content to ignore except for the fact that Daedric weapons are the highest-tier weapons in the game, so unless you want to handi-cap yourself you are forced to use them for the majority of your time playing a weapon-using character.

The weapons I picked still fit the \'Daedric\' category thematically, being dark and sinister looking, just without being and ugly mess of spikes and glowy red patches.
author: QuickFox
